description: Detects uncommon "userinit.exe" child processes, which could be a sign of uncommon shells or login scripts used for persistence.
author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
Tim Shelton
false_positives: Legitimate logon scripts or custom shells may trigger false positives. Apply additional filters accordingly.
name: Uncommon Userinit Child Process
query: ((process.parent.executable:/.*\\\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND (NOT process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(/.*[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ss][Rr][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\.[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/)) OR (process.command_line:/[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Qq][Uu][Oo][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Qq][Uu][Oo][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Cc][Ii][Tt][Rr][Ii][Xx]\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\\\[Ii][Cc][Aa][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text))))
